content: परिकर्मन् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} A servant. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} Painting or perfuming the body, personal decoration, dressing, toilet; कृताचारपरिकर्माणं <ls>Ś. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Painting or dyeing the foot; <ls>Ku. 4. 19.</ls> {@--3@} Preparation. {@--4@} Worship, adoration. {@--5@} (In Yoga <ab>phil.</ab>) Purifying, a means of purifying the mind; <ls>Śi. 4. 55</ls>; (see <ls>Malli.</ls> thereon). {@--6@} An arithmetical operation (of which there are {8} divisions).
